I am indebted to this game. I had never enjoyed FPS games and totally sucked at them. But HF2 is so compelling and perfectly paced that I got through it, and then I only mostly sucked!

What Michael Jackson's "Thriller" was to popular music, Half Life 2 is to gaming. A level of quality rarely equalled.

Mamma mia, mamma mia il doppiaggio! Il doppiaggio italiano è qualcosa di vomitevole, mi ricorda tantissimo le voci usate in "Dinosauri Antropomorfi", il film di animazione recensito da Yotobi, guardatelo e ascoltate i doppiatori (E' LA STESSA FOTTUTA COSA) ti passa davvero la voglia di giocarci a sentire ste voci prive di un briciolo di pathos. Il gioco è lento nello svolgimento della storia, ti rende catatonico.. l'ambiente sembra fatto e buttato lì a random. Gli NPC sono programmati da cani e sono stupidissimi, alcune volte ti inseguono senza motivo impedendoti di proseguire nella storia perchè all'inizio non hai armi e ti ammazzano subito. Soldi buttati via a mio parere, poi giudicate voi.
GOOOOOOOOOOOODDDD
Tout simplement le meilleur FPS solo de sa génération. Il a insufflé un nouveau souffle au genre et a permis a des dizaines de mods et jeux de voir le jour. Gordon Freeman, héros du genre ?

I played this game back when I was a kid and it scared me senseless. Headcrabs alone were nothing, but the ambience and mere sounds of zombies and zombie-infested areas left me nearly unable to play. Going back to it, the ambience still holds up, while zombies are nothing more than just obstacles in my path. Headcrabs got seemingly cuter, however...
Excellent game!
really really good better than all the Call of duty and Battlefields put together and i like battlefield

말이 더 필요할까...

퀘이크로 유명한 FPS의 대부 존 카맥은 "FPS의 스토리는 포르노의 스토리와 같다"라고 말했고, 실제로 퀘이크3 아레나는 이전과 다르게 스토리라는게 거의 없다시피 했다. 그러나 이러한 상념을 완전히 깨부신 게임이 바로 하프라이프 1이었는데,하프라이프2는 이러한 하프라이프 1을 충실히 따라서 스토리와 연출에 신경을 많이 썼다.뭐, 총기고증이나 그런데는 별 신경안썼지만, 멋진 세계관을 구경하고, 영화한편 보듯 편히 즐기면 될것같다. 

개인적으로 액션면에서는 콜 오브 듀티같이 영화적 연출과 액션에 신경쓰는 것에 밀리고, 세계관은 메트로 2033같은것에 밀린다고 생각하지만 그러하다고 하프라이프2가 결코 다른게임에 밀린다고 생각하진 않는다.

분명, 소장하기에 괜찮은 게임이다!

당신이 견뎌내야 하는 것: 멀미, 퍼즐. 
당신이 얻게 될 것: 뛰어난 연출, 생생한 현장감

Do I recommend this game? hell yes, It adds so much more to the previous game. it makes you laugh, it makes you cry, you'll wish you never have to say goodbye. 


seriously, do it.

Molti dicono: Half Life 2....pff è un gioco del medioevo con una gradifica bruttaio rispondo...NO
Questo non è un gioco questo è "IL GIOCO" non si è mai vista una grafica del genere e ricordiamo che è un gioco del 2004.....e vorrei anche ricordare che da questo gioco nasce l'intera comunità videoludica.....Portal, Team Fortress, Counter Strike e tutto il resto nasce da questo.....
Comprarlo
SI SONO SOLDI BEN SPESI......

10/10 On Every Thing Even Till This Day Reason Why We Have Counter-Strike and Garry's Mods it's  collector edtion is also a must have trust me ya love its story

This game is so much fun. This game just in a strange way just feels good all the way (apart from some rage bits). This game does great in keeping enough gameplay while keeping the story running though the whole game which is probaly one of the things that valve do best. This game also makes great use of the source engines physics which is a great thing to do since this is the first game to use the source engine and even though this game is quite outdated now it still looks great however there are some problems to the game. For one thing the game does feel like it goes on for too long (like the original half life) and not forget the waiting time for half life 3. I personally think that half life 2 and hl2 episode 2 are the 2 best in the half life series overall. I would really reccomend this game because it is just so much fun and it is so cheap on steam.
Pour moi un des meilleurs fps moderne et il y a en tout 3 licences half life 2 ( Half Life 2, HL 2 episode 1 et HL 2 episode 2 ) ce qui veut HALF LIFE 3 CONFIRME!!
ERMAGERD AMAZIN'!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
jeux mythique je le conseille a tous

This Game is amazing. Actually it is one of the best games I have ever played. It feels like being inside a movie. The story is exciting and full of surprises. The atmosphere is absolutely breathtaking and the gameplay is really on point. Considering how old this game already is I have to admit that the graphics are simply astonishing.

Everyone who calls himself a gamer should have played this game. I recommend playing on Hard difficulty to get the most out of the game. Searching for all achievements was also fun.

Just a great gaming experience.

What? You havent played this masterpiece yet?This game is a freaking legend,It has impressive graphics for such an old game,the story is never ever boring,the gameplay is something you propably havent come across yet.Buy it already stop reading this!!

Probably one of my favorite games, playing through it very late in 2014. Yes the graphics are a little outdated and a few other things you have to take into consideration but for pure gaming fun and an intelligent yet sometimes crazy story this is a gem. Would recommend to anyone!

half life 2is outdated and boring. It feels like doing the same thing over again and when you expect the game to throw a curve ball and change things up you end up doing the same thing from place to place. it feels even generic to play now. im not saying it was bad in it's glory days but the game is just not worth anymore when comparing to better and wider selection of fps on the market.

An immersive masterpiece ripe with social critique that seeks to awaken the masses, to change consciousness, to bring to light the subversive nature of power. Slicing through our modern culture to its core like a hot knife through butter this gaming magnum opus accelerates the senses giving birth - new life! - to us all as Freemen. Nothing short of a visceral piece of art, HL2 shook technology to its core and its impact reverberates to this day. so is like WoWOmG am@zing L0lz.

One of the greatest games I have ever played. I would reccomend this to anybody, who is looking to buy something for $10.00. Sometimes you will get stuck, you'll find out your mistake, and you feel REALLY stupid. But amazing game! 11/10

This game series comes only second to it's sister series, portal. This particular installation of the series continues the story in an excellent manner. The gameplay is addictive, the story compelling, and even though you can't talk, it's a brilliant game. The way the game is balanced and levels designed follow in Valve's excellent history of game making. Only positive things to say about this.
Best Single-Player FPS ever made. Nuff' Said.
Awesome physics and engine make this not only an amazing shooter, but a challenge that takes many hours to beat. When you're finished with this one, you can also take in another two episodes.
Bigger and louder than the first one, however it loses some of its intrigue.  Half-Life 2's story has almost become too complicated for its own good.  4/5 lambdas.
